metadata.title: CVE-2022-40090 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in function TIFFReadDirectory libtiff before 4.4.0allows attackers to cause a denial of service via crafted TIFF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-40090` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10+esm4
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10+esm4
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10+esm4
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10+esm4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tiff package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10+esm4').
